Key Match Events: Billy Cook prevented a run with a magnificent throw from right field to tag out Tommy Pham.
Billy Cook scored an unlikely run from first base on a single to center field.
Pre-Game Insights: Billy Cook provided a number of impressive defensive plays, including one in the third inning where he threw out a runner at the plate with a frozen rope.
Billy Cook broke out of an 0-for-11 skid with a base knock, which was just his third as a big leaguer.
Manager Derek Shelton praised Cook's hustle and awareness, stating that his plays helped keep the game competitive despite a rough outing from rookie Jared Jones.
Post-Match Reflections: Billy Cook expressed pride in the team's resilience after the come-from-behind win.
